posts.post_title: Prices Reduced ~T206 HOFers Collins Bender Huggins ~FOR SALE
posts.post_content:
I am selling the following T206's to make room for some new cards.  These are pretty nice and should make nice additions to someone's collection.  All prices are delivered and paypal gift/friends&family is preferred but not required.

Chief Bender Throwing w/trees Piedmont 350 subj.  vgex $58
